languages.text: "Вы всю запись целиком смотрели? По-вашему вот так ведет себя Вольный Торговец? Как обморочная девица?!"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"
languages.original_text: "Вы всю запись целиком смотрели? По-вашему вот так ведет себя Вольный Торговец? Как обморочная девица?!"

traits.locale_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?!"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Notice any differences in behaviour, did you? Well?"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Notice any differences in behaviour, did you? Well?"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Notice any differences in behaviour, did you? Well?"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?!"
"Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

languages.text: "Habt Ihr Euch die ganze Aufzeichnung angesehen? Sollte sich {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} Eurer Meinung nach so verhalten? Wie eine zur Ohnmacht neigende Jungfrau?"
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr Euch die ganze Aufzeichnung angesehen? Sollte sich {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} Eurer Meinung nach so verhalten? Wie eine zur Ohnmacht neigende Jungfrau?"

languages.text: « Avez-vous regardé l'intégralité de l'enregistrement ? À votre avis, ce comportement de jouvencelle en pâmoison est-il digne {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande }? »
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous regardé l'intégralité de l'enregistrement ? À votre avis, ce comportement de jouvencelle en pâmoison est-il digne {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande }? »

languages.text: “你应该看过整个视讯记录了吧？你真的认为行商浪人就这点本事？从头到尾都像个被吓傻了的小姑娘？”
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

traits.locale_text: “你应该看过整个视讯记录了吧？你真的认为行商浪人就这点本事？从头到尾都像个被吓傻了的小姑娘？”

languages.text: «¿Ha visto la grabación entera? Dígame, ¿es esa forma de comportarse para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente? ¿Cómo una doncella enamoradiza?».
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha visto la grabación entera? Dígame, ¿es esa forma de comportarse para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente? ¿Cómo una doncella enamoradiza?».

languages.text: 「録画を全部見たか？行動に違いがあるのに気づいただろう？さあ、どうだ？」
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Notice any differences in behaviour, did you? Well?"

traits.locale_text: 「録画を全部見たか？行動に違いがあるのに気づいただろう？さあ、どうだ？」

languages.text: "Onun tamamını izlediniz mi? Sizce bir Hür Tacir böyle mi davranır? Baygın bir genç kadın gibi mi?"
languages.original_text: "Did you watch the entire recording? Is this, in your view, how a Rogue Trader conducts {mf|himself|herself}? Like some swooning maiden?"

traits.locale_text: "Onun tamamını izlediniz mi? Sizce bir Hür Tacir böyle mi davranır? Baygın bir genç kadın gibi mi?"
